name: Finn Juhl | Chieftan
description: The iconic Chieftain chair is one of Finn Juhl’s absolute masterpieces, representing the peak of his career as a furniture designer.

name: Hans Wegner | Papa Bear
description: The wingback Papa Bear chair, also known as the Teddy Bear chair, has two outstretched arms with wood detailing once described by a critic as “great bear paws embracing you from behind” — hence the name.

name: George Nakashima | Grass-Seated
description: George Nakashima's Grass-Seated Chair is perhaps the designer-maker's most innovative design, originally created for MoMA's René d'Harnoncourt in 1943.
